Event.name: Violence
Event.definition:
<def-root>The words in this frame describe acts (or situations characterized by acts) that cause injury or harm. The acts may involve an <fen>Aggressor</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> injuring a <fen>Victim</fen>, or <fex name="ags">Aggressors</fex> causing each other harm.
<ex>Research on whether concealed carry laws increase <fex name="Instrument">gun</fex> <t>violence</t> <fex name="ags">among gang members</fex> has been inconclusive.</ex>
<ex><fex name="agr">They</fex> <m>committed</m> <t>brutality</t> <fex name="vic">against innocent civilians</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Cause">The storm's</fex> <t>violence</t> <fex name="Time">last week</fex> came without warning and caused unprecedented damage to costal regions.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Aggressor
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Aggressor</fen> is the person causing the <fen>Victim</fen>'s injury.
<ex><fex name="agr">Your</fex> <t>brutality</t> <fex name="vic">on your enemies</fex> seems to know no boundaries.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Victim
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Victim</fen> is the being or entity that is injured.
<ex>Increasing <t>violence</t> <fex name="Vic">against supporters of government reform</fex> have attracted international attention.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root><fen>Degree</fen> is the degree to which violence is done.
<ex>Our troops are working in conditions of <fex name="Degree">extreme</fex> <t>violence</t>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The Manner in which the <fen>Aggressor</fen> acts upon the <fen>Victim</fen>.
<ex>Acts of <fex name="Manner">wanton</fex> <t>violence</t> unconditionally deserve condemnation.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An intentional action performed by the <fen>Aggressor</fen> that results in the committing of a violent act.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root><fen>Place</fen> identifies the place where the violence occurs.
<ex>City leaders are troubled by recent surges in <fex name="Place">local</fex> <t>violence</t></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root><fen>Time</fen> identifies the time when the harm-causing event occurs.
<ex><fex name="Time">Last week's</fex> <t>violence</t> resulted in over three hundred injuries.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE is any object used to cause the injury.
<ex>Instances of <fex name="Instrument">gun</fex> <t>violence</t> will receive top priority from the police.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root><fen>Purpose</fen> identifies the purpose for which a harm-causing action is carried out.
<ex>I would only <m>commit</m> <t>violence</t> <fex name="Purpose">to protect myself</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Containing_event
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the event in which the harm is caused.
<ex><t>Violence</t> <fex name="con">in the standoff</fex> was unfortunate, but not unexpected.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A fact or action related to one of the participants in the volient act that the Aggressor responds to in doing violence.
<ex>They are quick to <t>violence</t> <fex name="Explanation">for petty reasons</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Iterations
Arg.definition:
<def-root><fen>Iterations</fen> refers to the number of times the violent act occurs.
<ex>He <m>committed</m> <t>brutality</t> <fex name="Iter">a dozen times</fex> over the past years.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Cause
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Cause</fen> marks expressions that indicate some non-intentional, typically non-human, force that inflicts harm on the <fen>Victim</fen>
<ex><fex name="Cause">The storm's</fex> <t>violence</t> left many lives in shambles.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the violent event and any of its participants. </def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition:
<def-root>How often the violence occurs.
<ex>Residents by now are used to the <fex name="fre">daily</fex> <t>violence</t> that plays out on their streets.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Aggressors
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Aggressors</fen> commit acts of violence upon each other.
<ex>Hope for a peaceful resoliton is gone as <t>violence</t> <fex name="ags">between the two sides</fex> reignites.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: violence.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an act that causes harm or injury upon another.
